ind_learners_faqs.question: Are there prerequisites for taking the classes?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: Most courses have no prerequisites or prior experience required. Some courses are more advanced and have prerequisites. Please see the individual course descriptions for details.

ind_learners_faqs.question: How much do the classes cost?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: While we charge a $100 fee and recommend a $50 donation (any amount over $100 is tax-deductible), fee waivers are readily available.

ind_learners_faqs.question: What materials are needed for the classes?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: A desktop or laptop computer is recommended for the best experience. Tablets may be used but could lack certain features for some of the platforms used in our classes.

ind_learners_faqs.question: What is the format of the class?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: Classes include two one-hour classes over zoom every week. Most classes have optional homework for enrichment purposes.

ind_learners_faqs.question: How long is one session?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: All of our direct enrollment classes are 8 weeks.

ind_learners_faqs.question: Will there be more classes in the future?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: Robotics for All may offer more classes in a later session. Please check this page in the future for any updates!

ind_learners_faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: All registrations cancelled two weeks before the course starts will receive a full refund, minus a 3% payment processing fee. All registrations cancelled one week before the course starts will receive a 50% refund, minus a 3% payment processing fee. Registrations cancelled less than one week prior to the course start date will receive no refund.
